attributes.action: have convicted crimianls punished instead of rehabilitated.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: More people are being released from prison and are offending again. We saw the arrogant posturing of the thugs that killed Damimola Taylor, from inside a prison. This rehabilitation does not work, these people must be punished as they will only offend again.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
